statements: SELECT * FROM customer_service_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT agent_id, customer_id, interaction_duration FROM customer_service_interactions WHERE satisfaction_score > 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_service_interactions WHERE customer_id = 101 AND interaction_duration > 10;
SELECT agent_id, interaction_duration FROM customer_service_interactions WHERE interaction_duration < 5 ORDER BY agent_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_score FROM customer_service_interactions WHERE satisfaction_score = 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_service_interactions WHERE agent_id = 2 ORDER BY interaction_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date FROM customer_service_interactions WHERE satisfaction_score > 3;
SELECT MIN(interaction_duration) AS shortest_duration FROM customer_service_interactions;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT agent_id) AS unique_agents FROM customer_service_interactions;
SELECT AVG(satisfaction_score) AS avg_satisfaction, MAX(satisfaction_score) AS max_satisfaction FROM customer_service_interactions GROUP BY agent_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_id = 1;
SELECT agent_id, interaction_date, interaction_duration FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT interaction_id, agent_id, customer_id FROM CustomerInteractions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT interaction_id, call_details FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC, interaction_time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT agent_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM CustomerInteractions GROUP BY agent_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT agent_id, customer_id FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_duration > '00:10:00';
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_date = '2022-03-15' AND interaction_duration < '00:05:00';
SELECT agent_id, AVG(satisfaction_rating) AS average_satisfaction FROM CustomerInteractions GROUP BY agent_id HAVING AVG(satisfaction_rating) > 4;
SELECT * FROM interactions;
SELECT agent_id, interaction_date, interaction_time FROM interactions WHERE interaction_duration > 30;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_location = 'New York';
SELECT agent_name, agent_team, agent_role FROM agents ORDER BY agent_experience DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, agent_id, customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_duration FROM interactions WHERE agent_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC, interaction_time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT agent_name, agent_team FROM agents WHERE agent_experience > 3;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_duration > 30 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC, interaction_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT agent_name, agent_role, agent_experience FROM agents WHERE agent_team = 'Support' AND agent_role = 'Senior';
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions;
SELECT agent_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_duration > 30;
SELECT agent_name, performance_score FROM AgentPerformance ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT program_name, program_trainer FROM TrainingPrograms WHERE program_duration >= 60;
SELECT feedback_date, feedback_rating, feedback_comment FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM AgentPerformance WHERE agent_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT agent_name, performance_score FROM AgentPerformance WHERE performance_score > 80 ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT program_name, program_trainer FROM TrainingPrograms WHERE program_duration > 30 AND program_trainer = 'Alice Smith';
SELECT c.agent_id, a.interaction_date, c.interaction_duration, a.performance_score FROM CustomerInteractions c JOIN AgentPerformance a ON c.agent_id = a.agent_id;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_rating, feedback_comment FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_rating BETWEEN 3 AND 5 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM agent_performance;
SELECT agent_id, total_interactions, feedback_rating FROM agent_performance ORDER BY feedback_rating DESC;
SELECT program_name, duration_days FROM training_programs WHERE completion_rate > 0.8;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_records WHERE address LIKE '%Ave%';
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_duration FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_id DESC;
SELECT agent_id, interaction_duration FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY interaction_duration ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, phone_number FROM customer_records WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT agent_id, average_response_time, total_interactions, feedback_rating FROM agent_performance WHERE training_completed = true ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT program_name, program_type, duration_days, completion_rate FROM training_programs WHERE completion_rate >= 0.8 ORDER BY program_name ASC;
